John A. Blair is the CEO/President at Executive Strategies, a management consultancy. With more than 25 yearsâ€™ experience in hi-tech, financial services, and engineering he has held a variety of executive positions, including multiple CEO assignments, in startups and Fortune 5 companies.

His industry experience includes: Internet and E-commerce, software companies, CRM, managed service providers, Nanotechnology, medical devices, hosted solution providers, Banking, service oriented companies.

John has started companies from scratch, participated in more than $11B in mergers/acquisitions, been through two IPOs and managed budgets in excess of $100M.

He has a broad understanding of all facets of business management, in particular, financial management, business development and marketing, product development, systems, and operations. He has an extensive track record working at both the strategic and hands-on management level.
